code: @Test public void testSerializationWithAnotherCharset() {     final Charset charset = StandardCharsets.UTF_16BE.     final String string = "之掃描古籍版實乃姚鼐的".     final byte[] bytes = string.getBytes(charset).     assertArrayEquals(bytes, new SimpleStringSchema(charset).serialize(string)).     assertEquals(string, new SimpleStringSchema(charset).deserialize(bytes)). }

@Test public void testSerializability() throws Exception {     final SimpleStringSchema schema = new SimpleStringSchema(StandardCharsets.UTF_16LE).     final SimpleStringSchema copy = CommonTestUtils.createCopySerializable(schema).     assertEquals(schema.getCharset(), copy.getCharset()). }
